attributes.action: Recognise our right to be solely subjects of the UK and to reject EU citizenship.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We do not wish to be citizens of a European superstate and recognise solely Her Majesty Queen Elizebeth the second and her successors as our head of state. We wish the right to reject EU citizenship and any obligations because of this and be allowed seperate blue passports to denote this.
